snippet.title: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 4 ROAD TO BORUTO - Nintendo Switch Announcement
snippet.description:
That's right, #NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 4 - ROAD TO BORUTO is coming to Nintendo Switch! Bring the amazing story of Naruto with you wherever you go when it arrives April 24th, 2020! 

But that's not all, this release will include Kinshiki Otsutsuki and Momoshiki Otsutsuki as playable characters + new outfits for 11 characters! (This content will also be available for purchase as DLC on other platforms)

©2002 MASASHI KISHIMOTO / 2017 BORUTO All Rights Reserved.
©BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment Inc.
